name: elimination
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 the process of removing something: the elimination of disease/pain their elimination from the competition by a process of elimination
by removing from several possible answers the ones that are unlikely to be correct until only one is left: We eventually found the answer by a process of elimination.
